attributes.action: Protect Stonehenge from development of any kind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention that the Stonehenge site has come under danger of development by the Government.  This should not be allowed as it is one of the few ancient landmarks everyone in the developed world knows about.

Links for more information:
http://www.savestonehenge.org.uk/
http://www.nationaltrust.org.uk/webpack/bin/webpack.exe/livebase?object=LiveBase1&itemurn=1495&mode=wbFullItem
